alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 12:04AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gulf and Franklin Counties through 100 AM EST/MIDNIGHT CST/... At 1204 AM EST/1104 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles south of Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Royal Bluff, Eleven Mile, St George Island St Pk, Odena, Indian Pass, Beverly, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport, Hays Place, Nine Mile, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point and Bald Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST/500 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
